title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 311.5 - Subject matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 311.5 - Subject matter list

State Regulations
(a) Each
records access officer shall maintain a reasonably detailed current list, by
subject matter, of all records in his or her possession, whether or not records
are available pursuant to subdivision 2 of section
87
of the

Public Officers Law (Freedom of Information Law). (b) The subject matter list shall be
sufficiently detailed to permit identification of the category of the record
sought. (c) The subject matter list
shall be updated annually. The date of the most recent update shall appear on
the first page of the subject matter list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
311.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
